ADDR_TYPE (UNION)
ADDR_TYPE (UNION)
Â¶
TYPE ADDR_TYPE : UNION
Uniform data structure (UNION) for physical identification of a slot of a PROFIBUS DP-slave or subslot of a PROFINET IO Device.
(see:

,

,

)
